iiv.gui

Class VisibleStateButtonUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractAction
      • iiv.gui.EasyAddAbstractAction
        • iiv.gui.VisibleStateButtonUpdate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, ComponentListener, ItemListener, Serializable, Cloneable, EventListener, Action

    public class VisibleStateButtonUpdate
extends EasyAddAbstractAction
implements ComponentListener, ItemListener
    This class adds a simple tool for building a check box, radio button or standard button to control and track the visibility of a component.
    Since:
    iiV1.15a
    See Also:
    CNUViewer, ButtonModel, Serialized Form

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionPerformed(ActionEvent ae)
      Handles ActionListener events.
      void componentHidden(ComponentEvent e)
      Implements component action routine to call updateButtonState when the component is hidden.
      void componentMoved(ComponentEvent e)
      Implements component action routine to call updateUpdateButtonState when the component is moved because component shown isn't often called but resize and moved often seem to get called when a component is shown.
      void componentResized(ComponentEvent e)
      Implements component action routine to call updateButtonState when the component is resized because component shown isn't often called but resize and moved often seem to get called when a component is shown.
      void componentShown(ComponentEvent e)
      Implements component action routine to call updateButtonState when the component is shown.
      Component getComponent()
      Gets the component.
      void itemStateChanged(ItemEvent e)
      Handles item listener events from the button model by calling updateComponentVisibilty.
      void setCheckboxButtonModel(ButtonModel bm)
      Overrides setCheckboxButtonModel to add this as an item listener.
      void setComponent(Component comp)
      Sets the component and add this as a component listener.
      void updateButtonState()
      Called when a component action occurs that may require updating the button state.
      void updateComponentVisibility()
      Called when a button item occurs that may require updating the component visibility.
